alert.note: Alert for Wyoming (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Lake Effect Snow Warning issued November 18 at 3:44AM EST until November 19 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...LAKE EFFECT SNOW WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Heavy lake effect snow. Storm total snow accumulations of 1 to 2 feet in the most persistent lake snows west of Attica. * WHERE...Wyoming county. * WHEN...Until 1 AM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the Friday morning or evening commute. The heavy snow could also bring down some tree limbs and cause scattered power outages. Experimental content below...do not use operationally To view the experimental polygons please see: http://www.weather.gov/buf/lespolygon COORD...4282 7820 4298 7809 4303 7820 4303 7844 4294 7891 4279 7890 4274 7903 4232 7975 4254 7879 4267 7856 TIME Y22M11D18T0600Z-Y22M11D18T1200Z COORD...4308 7820 4307 7859 4295 7898 4286 7889 4276 7900 4239 7962 4237 7956 4253 7915 4264 7866 4277 7822 TIME Y22M11D18T1200Z-Y22M11D19T0000Z COORD...4308 7820 4313 7879 4306 7903 4288 7889 4274 7903 4239 7962 4238 7950 4255 7909 4264 7866 4277 7822 TIME Y22M11D19T0000Z-Y22M11D19T1200Z
info.instruction: Heavy snow will fall in relatively narrow bands. If traveling, be prepared for rapidly changing road conditions and visibilities. Submit snow reports through our website or social media.
